item.title: Notes for Setting Up Back-end Server
item.description: Install CentOS OS: CentOS 7 Minimal Summary: Date & Time: Shanghai Network & Hostname: hostname to kserver.localdomain If you want to change hostname later, use: hostnamectl set-hostname AnythingYouLike.localdomain When installing: Set a root password First run & install some software yum -y update yum -y install vim yum -y install net-tools yum -y install git yum -y install unzip Set up OpenSSH vim /etc/ssh/sshd_config Remove # in the following line:
